subject: Amplifier ... To Frank ...
author: Luis
full_text:
Finally , i get the right sweep , I needed change from 4-8,5v for fm , and 1-6,3 for am . I needed a 5v amplitude . One question about amplifier , i make a pre-amplifier for electret mic , i test it , and , many sound feedback appear . This problem will be solutionated when the mic is in the eccho chamber ? .... I will make whith 2 diameter`s tubes . Other question . I saw , there are a cork in eccho chamber . 
Why is used this cork ? . How put the mic in it ?
